‚ùìFrequently Asked Questions:
ü§î How do I find relevant and high-traffic threads on Reddit and Quora?
RedCom does the work for you by monitoring your chosen keywords and brand mentions on Reddit and Quora. It sends you real-time alerts and weekly summaries of active, high-traffic discussions, so you can easily discover and engage in relevant threads without manual searching.

ü§î Will I receive notifications instantly when my keywords are mentioned?

Yes, RedCom provides real-time alerts when your keywords or brand are mentioned in new discussions. This allows you to engage promptly with potential customers.

ü§î Can I customize the keywords and brands I want to track?

Absolutely! You can select and update the keywords and brand names you wish to monitor at any time. This flexibility helps you stay focused on the most relevant conversations.

ü§î How do the weekly email reports work?

Each week, RedCom sends you an email summary of new Reddit and Quora threads related to your selected keywords and brand. 

ü§î Is there a limit to the number of keywords I can monitor?

The number of keywords you can track depends on your subscription plan. Please check our pricing page for details on the limits associated with each plan.

ü§î Can I track competitor brands as well?

Yes, you can add competitor brand names to your list of keywords. This allows you to stay informed about discussions involving competitors and identify opportunities to highlight your own offerings.

ü§î Do I need to install the Chrome extension to use RedCom?

While the Chrome extension enhances your experience by allowing you to engage directly from your browser, you can also access all of RedCom's features through our web platform.

ü§î How many comments can I make with the free plan?
You can generate up to 20 comments a month with the free plan. It allows you to test out how our tool works and see the impact of your AI-generated comments on driving traffic and engagement.

ü§î What response styles do you currently have?
We offer a variety of response styles, such as recommendation, question, funny and agree. These styles help match the tone of the conversation on Reddit and ensure your comments appear natural.

ü§î Can I set my own response style for the comments?
At the moment, you can choose from our predefined response styles but cannot create a completely custom style. However, we're working on adding the option to add your own custom style and response settings.

ü§î How does RedCom ensure the quality and relevance of the generated content?
We analyze the context of Reddit posts, including the title, description, and existing comments. By understanding the conversation's theme and sentiment, it generates personalized, human-like comments that are relevant and engaging.
